item.description:
***** You may call the Liberty Hotel at (617) 224-4000 to confirm if the movie is cancelled
Read the last paragraph on this page to find out Plan B *****

Take in a movie at Liberty Hotel in The Yard. FREE film with complimentary popcorn as well as a cash bar with movie candy for sale.

Please RSVP by emailing moviemondays@libertyhotel.com, so appropriate seating is arranged.

As always, get there when you can and stay as long or short as you're able. The weather on past Monday evenings has been ideal to be outside and hang out in this cool setting...enjoying the company of friendly fun folks.

The movie begins at sunset.

Movie Monday Flyer

Courtyard Menu

Cocktail Menu

Check out MBTA or  Hop Stop to create your route by public transit. Charles/MGH (red line) is the closest subway station and steps away. Government (green & blue lines) subway station is less than a ten (10) minute walk.

PLEASE MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU ORDER - THANK YOU

 

If the movie is cancelled the drinking, meeting and chatting will be held in the Liberty Lobby Bar located at the top of the escalators. You'll find me playing the card game solitaire and a purple sparkly peace sticker on my white sleeveless shirt.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for directions to the Courtyard from the doorman at the hotel entrance or follow the signs. Meet at the seats in the last row.
item.name: Drinks and/or a Movie at Liberty Hotel - Monday August 8th
